name: exercism-azure-bruno
description: Bruno API tests for Azure functions

scripts.test-all: cd exercism-api-tests && bru run --env azure --format junit --output ../report.xml
scripts.change: cd exercism-api-tests && bru run Change --env azure --format junit --output ../report.xml
